This bug converts a BadLocationException into an IAE. In bug 86253 a
BadLocationException is catched with an empty block ==> might be same problem as
in bug 86253.

When restoring the selection, a BLE may be thrown if the selection was
invalidated. There are two fixes:

1. We should use {remember,restore}Selection instead of cooking our own
selection remembering in ProjectionViewer
2. If the viewer is not redrawing in the first place when we start to execute
the projection commands, there is no need to do anything at all with the
selection, as there is a surrounding call that does the restoration after we
return. This is the case when reverting an editor.

fixed > 20050225
